import pandas as pd
from lightgbm import LGBMClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import roc_auc_score
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

RANDOM_STATE = 42
source.ede5a6a1:
X_train, X_val, y_train, y_val = train_test_split(
    train.drop(columns=['target']), train['target'],
    test_size=0.2, random_state=RANDOM_STATE
)
source.a5b13faa:
model = LGBMClassifier(random_state=RANDOM_STATE, use_missing=True)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

print('train:\t', roc_auc_score(y_train, model.predict_proba(X_train)[:, 1]))
print('val:\t', roc_auc_score(y_val, model.predict_proba(X_val)[:, 1]))
source.05008a73:
predicted = model.predict_proba(test)[:, 1]
sub = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test['Id'], 'Predicted': predicted})
sub.groupby(by='Id').agg('mean').to_csv('easy.csv')
